column10: Drivers going northbound on N Harrison St do not check crosswalk before turning left onto 27th St N.  In addition, crosswalk is not well lit at night which hampers visibility for drivers.

Due to curve on 26th St N, pedestrians and drivers traveling north on N Jefferson St can't easily see eastbound traffic on 26th St N.  In addition, there are no stop signs or crosswalks along 26th St N to slow the fast-moving traffic heading to/from the nearby busy areas of Yorktown High School and Lee Harrison Shopping Center.  As a pedestrian on N Jefferson St heading north, crossing this intersection is dangerous, especially during morning and evening rush hours.  As a pedestrian, you must position yourself well into the street to watch for approaching vehicles.  This intersection should have 4-way stop signs and crosswalks.
